name: jacques-context-manager
description: Claude Code context monitor - track token usage in real-time

scripts.install:all: npm run install:core && npm run install:server && npm run install:dashboard
scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:server && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:gui
scripts.stop:server: if [ -f ~/.jacques/server.pid ]; then kill $(cat ~/.jacques/server.pid) 2>/dev/null; rm -f ~/.jacques/server.pid; echo 'Server stopped'; else lsof -ti :4243 | xargs kill 2>/dev/null || echo 'No server running'; fi
scripts.restart:server: npm run stop:server && sleep 1 && npm run start:server
